explains: adj. 易于……的，有……倾向的；恰当的，适宜的；善学的，聪明的

sentences.en: The words of this report are as apt today as in 1929.
sentences.cn: 这份报告的措词在当今如在1929年一样恰当。

sentences.en: Babies are apt to put objects into their mouths.
sentences.cn: 婴儿爱把东西往嘴里塞。

sentences.en: She was apt to raise her voice and wave her hands about.
sentences.cn: 她常常提高嗓门并挥舞双手。
